pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Justin Masterson; Elliot Johnson is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .730 OPS against them this season and .621 against everything else.
Justin Masterson got Elliot Johnson to chase a four-seam fastball; Johnson is hitting .000 against them in that location this season compared to .250 overall.
